/usr/bin/g++   CMakeFiles/conv.dir/convolution.cu.o CMakeFiles/conv.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o conv -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_gapi.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ml.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_photo.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_stitching.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_video.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_dnn.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.4.5.1  -L"/usr/local/cuda-10.0/lib64/stubs" -L"/usr/local/cuda-10.0/lib64" -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
